Email_1.Subject: Shocked
Email_1.Body:
A lot of people died today. 
    I am utterly shocked! We could have saved the
    lives of those 8 people! We will just have to
    try harder next time.
	
	Your next assignment is available, but keep in
	mind your performance is being closely 
	monitored after a screw up like that.

Email_2.Subject: Keep Your Head Up
Email_2.Body:
Hey, we all screwed up at some point. Just try
    and learn from it. You can't stop every crazy 
    you run into. Let's just make sure we stop the
    next one.
